short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screenshare extension for Virtulive SmartED and TeamMeet Applications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Virtulive WebRTC screensharing extention allows users to share their screen or one of their applications with several attendees. For security reasons, screen/application sharing with WebRTC needs an extension to be installed.This extention to be installed for using  SmartEd and TeamMeet screen sharing feature.
